title: Android getting ‘archive’ feature to let you free up device storage without uninstalling apps
content:
Google announced to third-party developers today that Android is “working on a new feature that would enable app archiving.” The company did not specify when it would launch, but started laying the groundwork for developer adoption. 

more…

The post Android getting ‘archive’ feature to let you free up device storage without uninstalling apps appeared first on 9to5Google.
